name: brand_name
description: The brand name input by collaborators. This has been transformed to be all lower case and removed any trailing white space.

name: parent_company_name
description: The parent company name input by collaborators or dervied through data cleaning. This is the top most parent company that owns the brand.

name: id
description: A unique identifier for the parent company that is either the wikidata id a url address or the company or brand name input by BFFP collaborators.

name: validated
description: The level of validation that has occurred for the data point id. False means only minimal validation has occurred. True means the data point id has been manually verified. Attempted means the data point verification has been attempted but is still somewhat uncertian.

name: submission_type
description: A identifier for the submission type made to the BFFP data portal. Unique names are unique data sources or formats.

name: submission_id
description: A unique identifier for each submission in integer format.

name: year
description: The year that the survey took place.

name: item_description
description: More information about the trash object characterized. This is not standardized yet beyond controlling for it being a character type and therefore should be used carefully.

name: type_product
description: The type of product that the trash object is by use or sector. Null means there was no input.

name: type_material
description: The type of material that the object is by polymer type.

name: layer
description: The number of layers that the plastic material has.

name: name_of_lead
description: A unique identifier for the person in charge of the survey. Names have been converted into numbers but numbers correspond across rows.

name: is_trained
description: A description on whether the surveyor was trained (yes) or not (no).

name: organization
description: A unique identifier for the organization submitting the data.

name: volunteer
description: The number of volunteers involved in the brand audit.

name: start_of_audit
description: The date the brand audit began.

name: end_of_audit
description: The date the brand audit ended.

name: time_spent
description: The amount of time spent on the audit in hours.

name: city
description: The name of the city where the audit took place.

name: province
description: The name of the province where the audit took place.

name: country
description: The name of the country where the audit took place.

name: continent
description: The name of the continent where the audit took place.

name: type_of_audit
description: The type of audit.

name: specifics_of_audit
description: What land type the audit took place on.

name: event_total_count
description: The total number of pieces of trash recorded in the audit.

name: event_id
description: A unique identifier for each audit event.

name: longitude_most_specific
description: The most specific latitude coordinate we could come up with in decimal degrees.

name: latitude_most_specific
description: The most specific longitude coordinate we could come up with in decimal degrees.

name: location_specificity
description: The location specificity.

name: total_count
description: The total number of pieces of trash during the audit that were found of the type listed in this row including all descriptors.

name: proportion
description: The proportion of the total trash from the event of the type described in this row.
